articles.title: A New Cosmic Model To Reveal What's Inside Colliding Black Holes - SciTechDaily
articles.description: A research paper uses new methods to analyze the waves that black holes emit when they collide. In 2015, scientists for the first time detected gravitational waves, ripples in space-time that occur when major cosmic events—like the collision and merging of tw…
articles.content:
ByColumbia UniversityMarch 4, 2023
An artists impression of two black holes about to collide and merge. New research has led to the development of a more sophisticated model for modeling cosmic even… [+2466 chars]
